data.text: @CouncilwomanKrj Toddlers are more protected than boosted 30 year olds. There is NO need to cover their faces with cloth, which does nothing anyway.
@AStoneHoward @CouncilwomanKrj Maskers are anti-data. They have no clue what data is
@CouncilwomanKrj @CouncilwomanKrj is pro-criminal, anti-police, and anti-children. A perfect democrat!
@CouncilwomanKrj Remember how in 2020, 2021, and 2022 ZERO countries in Europe masked toddlers because it is useless. The US has finally gotten the memo except I guess you haven’t.

@CouncilwomanKrj She spins the “what will get reactions” wheel and this is what it landed on today. 
I don’t, for one second, believe she cares about any of the stuff she posts. She’s desperately trying to get attention.
@CouncilwomanKrj The Mayor @NYCMayor is an idiot, though
@CouncilwomanKrj This is shocking! 2-4 yr olds should learn to talk and read through a mask to make you feel safer? It’s preposterous! #unmaskourtoddlers
@CouncilwomanKrj You have proven yourself to be useless.  Please stop talking.
